issue.title: sp5.servicept.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://sp5.servicept.com/sp5_demo2/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsp5.servicept.com%2Fsp5_demo2%2F) ### Comment Username: @JasonMaloney > ServicePoint is THE most widely used HMIS (Homeless Management Information System) product in the US. This is a critical service for homeless shelters nationwide. Nothing hosted at servicept.com (or any of its subdomains) should be blocked. The product contains no ads. > > I have provided the URL for a demo instance at sp5.servicept.com, but other subdomains are also blocked (e.g. michigan.servicept.com, sftp.servicept.com) are also blocked. Other domains associated with this product include bowmansystems.com. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/adD5yBT.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/uuaN1x4.png)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNTg5OTEwODI3Ng==.html?scm=20140719.manual.15319.video_XNTg5OTEwODI3Ng%3D%3D](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fv.youku.com%2Fv_show%2Fid_XNTg5OTEwODI3Ng%3D%3D.html%3Fscm%3D20140719.manual.15319.video_XNTg5OTEwODI3Ng%253D%253D) ### Comment Username: @bu00 > 你好， > https://youku.com/ > 这个网站有时可以直接跳过广告观看视频，但有时会弹出一个错误界面，无法继续播放。 > 关闭AdGuard后会显示广告，可正常播放。 > 希望打开AdGuard不再弹出错误界面，非常感谢。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/FxAwNc4.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/SwGLAPX.png)

Send Do-Not-Track header,

Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Flash,
Block Java DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base
